comments.comment: Aney ban kalawaddo, umbe mathakaya miniththu 5 kata wadiya nathi bawayi apita penenne. kohomada Sjith P wa patta gahala damma hati? Derana 360 kathawedi mulu kaalayama Sajithayata redi galawenna dunna, eyage papa kohomada kotinta hamudaawe aayuda deela ey aayudawalinma aapahu kotiyo hamudaawatayi policiyatai kelawala damma hati kiwwa mathakada? tika dawasakata passe Sajitha kapatikamin  kiwwa eya janaadipathi unoth Fonseka aarakshaka amathi karana bawa. kiwwa witharayi ammo menne Fonseka sarama oluwe bandagena duwala gihin Sajithaya langa dana gahuwa. eeta passe Sajith wage honda kenek mey kalawadi Fonsekata thawath nathilu. dan penawa neda kaatada ikmanin amathaka wenne kiyalaa?  mehemath thanhaawen walmath wunu, wayirayen pissu watuna gal guddek !
